query:
SELECT 
  facility, 
  product, 
  Count(device) qty, 
  Round((sum(CASE WHEN device_fm = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/Count(device))*100,1) yield  
FROM (
  SELECT device, facility, product, device_fm, state 
  FROM pkg.screen_test 
  where end_dt > sysdate -.5 
    and product = 'LR4-TOSA'
)
GROUP BY facility, product
